headline: Trudeau's environmental record on the line in Canada election year
trailText: October’s parliamentary elections may hinge on the recent pipeline nationalisation and the government’s carbon tax plan

headline: Pipeline battle puts focus on Canada's disputed right to use indigenous land
trailText: British Columbia pipeline battle highlights broader issue: who has authority in territories never signed away by treaty

headline: Rahaf al-Qunun lands in Toronto after long journey to safety
trailText: Saudi teen was granted asylum by Canada after flying to Thailand to escape her family

headline: China expresses 'strong dissatisfaction' with Trudeau as countries spar
trailText: Prime minister should ‘respect the rule of law’, a spokeswoman said after Trudeau criticised a Canadian man’s death sentence

headline: Former China envoys call on Xi Jinping to release two detained Canadians
trailText: Open letter says the arrests mean diplomats are more cautious about work in China

headline: The centre ground may look barren but that’s the place to look for life
trailText: Scratch the surface with voters and it’s clear there would be strong support for politicians – even a new party – taking the middle way

headline: Canadian minister resigns from Trudeau's cabinet amid scandal
trailText: Jody Wilson-Raybould quit amid allegations Trudeau’s office pressured her to avoid prosecuting SNC-Lavalin Group Inc

headline: Justin Trudeau’s image of transparency threatened by scandal
trailText: Canada’s PM losing support after claim he pressed minister not to prosecute firm

headline: The pioneering ex-minister at the centre of a Canadian scandal
trailText: Jody Wilson-Raybould, Canada’s first indigenous attorney general, will testify over claims Trudeau aides pressured her to let a firm escape prosecution

headline: Justin Trudeau refuses to resign over claims officials interfered in bribery prosecution
trailText: Ex-attorney general Jody Wilson-Raybould testifies on bribery scandal and says pressure from members of the government included ‘veiled threats’

headline: Trudeau denies wrongdoing and says ex-minister could be ousted from party
trailText: Embattled Canadian PM considers fate of Jody Wilson-Raybould after Liberal MP failed to confirm she had confidence in him

headline: Explained: the case that could bring down Canada's Justin Trudeau
trailText: Justin Trudeau is facing his first major political scandal, with claims of political interference in prosecution decisions

headline: Justin Trudeau’s disgrace is like watching a unicorn get run over
trailText: The political scandal engulfing the Canadian prime minister has outed him as not quite the hero we all believed he was, says former Globe and Mail columnist Leah McLaren

headline: Justin Trudeau's cabinet rallies behind him after second resignation
trailText: Several prominent members of cabinet attended a campaign-style rally Monday night in support of the climate change policy

headline: Trudeau expresses regret over scandal, but does not apologise
trailText: Canadian PM addresses SNC-Lavalin saga, saying no laws have been broken

headline: Trudeau scandal: PM's party blocks ex-attorney general from testifying again
trailText: Liberal member called for vote in meeting to determine if Jody Wilson-Raybould should testify again amid disapproval

headline: Canada's top civil servant resigns over role in growing Trudeau scandal
trailText: Michael Wernick to resign as clerk of the privy council as Trudeau battles allegations he and his aides pressured ex-attorney general

headline: 'He's not a bad person, but …' scandal-hit Justin Trudeau turns voters off
trailText: In the Canadian prime minister’s Montreal base the Lavscam imbroglio has taken a toll on previously staunch support

headline: Why the silence around the scandal threatening Justin Trudeau?
trailText: You’d never guess the Canadian prime minister was fighting for his political life, says comedy writer Jack Bernhardt

headline: Trudeau apologizes for 'smug, mean' jibe at indigenous activist
trailText: Canadian prime minister was criticized for telling woman who interrupted his speech: ‘Thank you very much for your donation’
